___quantity_type.description: The quantity type for this sample.

___effective_time_frame.description: The time frame when this sample occurred. When the HKSample `startDate` and `endDate` values are different, we recommend using the `time_interval` time frame property, and when they are the same, we recommend using the `date_time` time frame property.

___metadata.description: An array of extra information describing this sample.

references.description: The class reference for HKUnit that describes all the units used in HealthKit.

___unit_value.description: The quantity of this sample, as a unit and value.

references.description: The `countUnit` HKUnit this property is typically used for.

___count.description: The quantity of this sample, as a raw scalar value.

description: An Apple HealthKit quantity sample that represents data using a single numerical value.
